word: G4299 - πρόκριμα - prókrima - prok'-ree-mah - Prefer one before another

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Prefer one before another
an opinion formed before the facts are known a prejudgment, a prejudice,
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G4253 and G2919; a prejudgment (prejudice), that is, prepossession: - prefer one before another.
